Hello, I'm Matt Dobson.

I’m a product designer at Humana.

I’m proud to be part of the team at the Digital Experience Center. We are a technology incubator shaping 21st-Century healthcare and transforming Humana into a human-centered, tech-driven company. In my free time I help organize Louisville’s IxDA chapter and in 2016 was part of the team that organized the Midwest UX Conference.

Previously I was an art director at Power, published a magazine, and co-produced a late-night variety show at a Tony Award winning theatre.

You can see my resume here or email me at matt@mattdobson.com
